creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
test/abts.c outputs test status to stdout and stderr, however that is not very
useful on Windows CE.  The attached patch allows test status messages to be
written with OutputDebugString in addition to stdout or stderr.  The code is
#ifdef(_WIN32_WCE), but it may be generally beneficial to all Windows users so
#ifdef (_WIN32) might be considered.

creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18529
Output test status to OutputDebugString in addition to stdout
Mass reassign the 44 open apr-bugs to apr bug list
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
Interesting concept.  What about a command line switch to enable this?

Not pushing this up as a priority for the forthcoming 0.9/1.2 releases,
but it looks beneficial.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
